title: Images of the wild
creator_credit: Norman Lightfoot, Beryl Fox and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Robert Bateman, Canadian naturalist and international wildlife artist, is seen at work in his studio in Rockwood, Ontario, on location in northern Ontario and East Africa, and at the opening night of a show of his paintings in Hamilton. He talks about his approach to nature, that dominates his approach to painting.
